name: pnp-planner-migrate-sharepoint-list
title: Planner migration to SharePoint list
shortDescription: This script migrates an existing plan to a SharePoint Online List with this sample.
longDescription: Use the CLI for Microsoft 365 to migrate an existing plan to a SharePoint Online List with this sample. You can specify the planner plan that you want to migrate and the script will generate a new list for you with the required fields and views. The current sample does migrate all tasks however it skips the following information: Categories, Comments made on tasks, Attachments

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
